item.title: Assessing the sucess of a new product via Logistic Regression
item.description: body { text-align: justify} These are a series of analysis to show all the potential of the main classification algorithms. The table shows the business clients of a company that has just launched a new product online. Some of the clients responded positively to the ads by buying the product and other responded negatively by not buying the product. The last column of the table tells for each user if the user bought the product or not.

item.title: Andrea Perlato
item.description: body { text-align: justify} I started my caree as a Data Scientist more than 10 years ago in the field of Neuroscience at the University of Verona - School of Medicine, Italy. As point person in data analysis, I studied the single and multi-unit recordings from behaving non human primates. Moreover, I have been conducting psychophysic experiments on human subjects to investigate the brain plasticity in drug addicts. Find out more.
